member.summary: Provides the default name of the cookie to make cookie detection.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the default name of the cookie.

member.name: M:GP.Utils.Web.CookieDetectorAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the name of the cookie that is used to detect if cookies are not enabled.
member.param: Name of the cookie. Cannot be null or empty or whitespace.
member.exception: is null or empty or has only whitespaces.

member.summary: Called by the ASP.NET MVC framework after the action result executes.
member.param: The filter context.

member.summary: Provides information about the cookie detection.

member.summary: Determines whether cookies are enabled for the current request using the default cookie name.
member.param: The request.
member.returns: true if cookies are enabled for the current request using the default cookie name; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Determines whether cookies are enabled for the current request using the specified. cookie name.
member.param: The request.
Name of the cookie. Cannot be null or empty or whitespace.
member.returns: true if cookies are enabled for the current request using the specified cookie name; otherwise, false.
member.exception: is null or empty or has only whitespaces.

member.name: T:GP.Utils.Web.Gravatar
member.summary: Represents a gravatar.

member.name: P:GP.Utils.Web.Gravatar.Email
member.summary: The Email for the user.

member.name: P:GP.Utils.Web.Gravatar.LinkTitle
member.summary: Optional property for link title for gravatar website link

member.name: P:GP.Utils.Web.Gravatar.DefaultImage
member.summary: An optional "default" parameter may follow that specifies the full, URL encoded URL, protocol included, of a GIF, JPEG, or PNG image that should be returned if either the requested email address has no associated gravatar, or that gravatar has a rating higher than is allowed by the "rating" parameter.

member.name: P:GP.Utils.Web.Gravatar.Size
member.summary: Size of Gravatar image. Must be between 1 and 512.

member.name: P:GP.Utils.Web.Gravatar.MaxAllowedRating
member.summary: An optional "rating" parameter may follow with a value of [ G | PG | R | X ] that determines the highest rating (inclusive) that will be returned.

member.name: M:GP.Utils.Web.Gravatar.ToString
member.summary: Returns a that represents this instance.
member.returns: A that represents this instance.

member.name: M:GP.Utils.Web.Gravatar.ToString(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a that represents this instance.
member.param: if set to true to return a secure request.
member.returns: A that represents this instance.

member.name: T:GP.Utils.Web.GravatarHtmlHelper
member.summary: Html helper to deal with gravatars.

member.name: M:GP.Utils.Web.GravatarHtmlHelper.Gravatar(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,System.String)
member.summary: Gravatars the specified HTML helper.
member.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
The email to create the gravatar for.
member.returns: The html markup for the gravatar image.

member.name: M:GP.Utils.Web.GravatarHtmlHelper.Gravatar(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,System.String,System.Int16)
member.summary: Gravatars the specified HTML helper.
member.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
The email to create the gravatar for.
The size of the image.
member.returns: The html markup for the gravatar image.

member.name: T:GP.Utils.Web.GravatarRatingType
member.summary: Defines the rating of the image.

member.name: F:GP.Utils.Web.GravatarRatingType.G
member.summary: Suitable for display on all websites with any audience type.

member.name: F:GP.Utils.Web.GravatarRatingType.PG
member.summary: May contain rude gestures, provocatively dressed individuals, the lesser swear words, or mild violence.

member.name: F:GP.Utils.Web.GravatarRatingType.R
member.summary: May contain such things as harsh profanity, intense violence, nudity, or hard drug use.

member.name: F:GP.Utils.Web.GravatarRatingType.X
member.summary: May contain hardcore sexual imagery or extremely disturbing violence.

member.summary: Starts a new collection item for master child relationships using the specified html prefix.

The HTML field prefix.
member.returns: The disposable object managing the life time of the generated html prefix.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' has an invalid format..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' and '{1}' must be equal..

member.name: P:GP.Utils.Web.Properties.Resources.ErrorFuture
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' must be in the future..

member.name: P:GP.Utils.Web.Properties.Resources.ErrorInvalidMail
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' must be a valid mail address..

member.name: P:GP.Utils.Web.Properties.Resources.ErrorInvalidUrl
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' must be a valid url..

member.name: P:GP.Utils.Web.Properties.Resources.ErrorInvalidUrlName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Name can only have lower letters and minus..

member.name: P:GP.Utils.Web.Properties.Resources.ErrorMaximumLength
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' must have less then {1} characters..

member.name: P:GP.Utils.Web.Properties.Resources.ErrorMinimum
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' must be greater than {1}..

member.name: P:GP.Utils.Web.Properties.Resources.ErrorMinimumLength
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' must have between {2} and {1} characters..

member.name: P:GP.Utils.Web.Properties.Resources.ErrorPasswords
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Passwords must be equal..

member.name: P:GP.Utils.Web.Properties.Resources.ErrorRange
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' must be between {1} and {2}..

member.name: P:GP.Utils.Web.Properties.Resources.ErrorRequired
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' is required..

member.name: T:GP.Utils.Web.ResourceHandlerBase
member.summary: Base handler class to load resources and adjust them before returning them.

member.name: P:GP.Utils.Web.ResourceHandlerBase.IsReusable
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether another request can use the instance.
member.returns: true if the instance is reusable; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: This http handler does not have a any state and therefore can be reused.

member.name: M:GP.Utils.Web.ResourceHandlerBase.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:GP.Utils.Web.ResourceHandlerBase.ProcessRequest(System.Web.HttpContext)
member.summary: Enables processing of HTTP Web requests by a custom HttpHandler that implements the interface.
member.param: An object that provides references to the intrinsic server objects (for example, Request, Response, Session, and Server) used to service HTTP requests.
member.remarks: Loads the css file and caches it, when possible. Also provides some adjustment steps before responding.

member.name: M:GP.Utils.Web.ResourceHandlerBase.AdjustResource(System.Web.HttpContext,System.String)
member.summary: Adjusts the resource before returning it.
member.param: An object that provides references to the intrinsic server objects used to service HTTP requests. Will never be null.
The resource to adjust. Will never be null.
member.returns: The adjusted resource.
member.remarks: Typical operations are compression and color adjustment.

member.name: T:GP.Utils.Web.Routing.LanguageCodeConstraint
member.summary: Defines route contraints for language codes.

member.name: M:GP.Utils.Web.Routing.LanguageCodeConstraint.Match(System.Web.HttpContextBase,System.Web.Routing.Route,System.String,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,System.Web.Routing.RouteDirection)
member.summary: Determines whether the URL parameter contains a valid value for this constraint.
member.param: An object that encapsulates information about the HTTP request.
The object that this constraint belongs to.
The name of the parameter that is being checked.
An object that contains the parameters for the URL.
An object that indicates whether the constraint check is being performed when an incoming request is being handled or when a URL is being generated.
member.returns: true if the URL parameter contains a valid value; otherwise, false.
